author: Special Correspondent
text:
Police have arrested a youth for allegedly sexually assaulting a 15-year-old girl.

The police said that the girl from a village near Maanur, who is studying class X, was rushed to Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital from the school after she complained of severe stomach pain. On examining the girl, the doctors found that she was pregnant and alerted Maanur police.

During interrogation, the police found that T. Arockiyam (19) of the same area had sexually assaulted the girl. Based on the complaint from the girl’s mother, the police arrested Arockiyam on Wednesday.

Girl abducted, raped

In another case, a youth abducted a girl from a village near Maanur when she had come to the village from the hostel for Pongal celebration and raped her.

Maanur police have registered a case.
title: Youth held for sexually assaulting teen
